channel.title: IN on Wonderful World
channel.description: Recent content in IN on Wonderful World

item.title: Jodhpur
item.description: Jodhpur is also known as the Blue City, an apt name as most houses in the old city are shades of blue. This is particularly noticeable on the north side of the town, known as Brahmpuri for the many Brahmins that live there.

item.title: Riwai
item.description: This village features a unique bridge created by forcing tree roots to grow in a particular twisted pattern. The result is a living bridge.

item.title: Tomb of Isa Khan
item.description: The tomb of the noble Isa Khan Niazi is located in the Humayun’s Tomb complex in Delhi, India. The mausoleum, octagonal in shape and built mainly of red sandstone, was built in 1547â€“1548 during the reign of Sher Shah Suri. The mosque of Isa Khan is located west of the mausoleum, which along with other buildings form the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Humayun’s tomb complex.
